name: Windows Dependency File
summary: Learn about .DEP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DEP files can be created using the Microsoft Package and Deployment Wizard (PDW), which is part of the Microsoft Office 2000 Developer software package.

description: File used by various Windows programs or Windows application components; contains run-time requirements for a program, such as needed components or the names of target installation files and directories for an installer; often used for declaring dependencies for productivity tools being integrated with Microsoft Office.
